field.name: help
field.p: Click to add a contact in your address book.
OpenERP helps you easily track all activities related to a supplier: discussions, history of purchases, documents, etc.

button.name: bt_cross_mark
button.confirm: Do you want to cancel the Quotation ?

button.name: bt_cross_mark
button.confirm: Do you want to cancel the Quotation ?

field.name: help
field.p: Click to create a quotation that will be converted into a purchase order.

Use this menu to search within your purchase orders by references, supplier, products, etc. For each purchase order, you can track the related discussion with the supplier, control the products received and control the supplier invoices.

tree.colors: red:virtual_available<0;blue:virtual_available>=0 and state in ('draft', 'end', 'obsolete');black:virtual_available>=0 and state not in ('draft', 'end', 'obsolete')
red:virtual_available<0;blue:virtual_available>=0 and state in ('draft', 'end', 'obsolete');black:virtual_available>=0 and state not in ('draft', 'end', 'obsolete')
